## Model

```{r}
gss <- read_csv("gss.csv")
gss_t <- gss
gss_t1 <- gss_t %>%
  select(total_children, age,
         income_respondent, education)

gss_clean <- gss_t1 %>% na.omit()
head(gss_clean)
```

```{r}
negbinmodel <- glm.nb(total_children ~ age + 
                        as.factor(education) + 
                        as.factor(income_respondent), 
                      data = gss_test2)
summary(negbinmodel)
```
